results.title: Off-Duty Pilot Accused of Trying to Cut the Engines on an Alaska Airlines Flight
results.abstract: The flight was diverted to Portland, Ore., because of a “credible security threat” inside the cockpit, the airline said. An off-duty pilot was charged with attempted murder.
